name: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request.RepresentationTypes
desc: The various types of thumbnails that you can request.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new thumbnail type object for a given value.

items.name: static var all: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request.RepresentationTypes
items.desc: The thumbnail type to generate all possible thumbnail representations.

items.name: static var icon: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request.RepresentationTypes
items.desc: A file icon representation of a file.

items.name: static var lowQualityThumbnail: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request.RepresentationTypes
items.desc: A faster to generate version of the thumbnail that may sacrifice quality for speed.

items.name: static var thumbnail: QLThumbnailGenerator.Request.RepresentationTypes
items.desc: A thumbnail representation of a file.
